description: From a name mistakenly assigned, Girardinus guppii, after biologist Robert J. L. Guppy, to previously assigned Poecilia reticulata.

entries.meaning: A tiny freshwater fish, Poecilia reticulata, popular in home aquariums, that usually has a plain body and black or dark blue tail for the females and a more colorful tail for the males.
examples: Fred kept a tank of guppies by the windowsill.
Throw that one back; itâ€™s just a guppy!

entries.meaning: (paintball) A tube holding paintballs before they are loaded into the gun.
examples: I reached into my pack and grabbed a guppy to reload. Pouring in the contents, I kept my eyes ahead as I was supposed to do.

entries.meaning: (climbing) A hold across the palm of the hand rather than the fingertips.
